Research Centre Introduction of New Energy Vehicle Electronic Product Testing Center Electronic Information Material Reliability Testing Center R&D Center for the Application of Modern Printing and Packaging Standardization Technology Collaborative Innovation Center of New Information Software Quality and System Security Testing Center Introduction: The Institute of IoT is an independent research institution established by Shenzhen Polytechnic University, with scientific research platforms such as "Research Center for Industrial IoT Engineering Technology" granted by the Department of Science and Technology of Guangdong Province, "Laboratory for Industrial IoT Control Technology Engineering" granted by Guangdong Provincial Development and Reform Commission, "Collaborative Innovation Center of Internet of Things Application Technology" granted by the Ministry of Education of the PRC, and "Laboratory of Industrial IoT Heterogeneous Network Control Technology Engineering" granted by the Development and Reform Commission of Shenzhen Municipality. The Institute owns high-end research equipment of tens of millions of RMB. Currently, the Institute of IoT is conducting research in the following areas: ( 1 ) Industrial Internet of Things/Industrial Internet The research in this area includes the interconnection of industrial production equipment, identification and positioning of people and goods, energy-saving control and automatic energy consumption detection, production equipment status detection and fault call, remote notification of important information at production sites, industrial emission reduction, and environmental monitoring, and other common key technologies generated by various demands. ( 2 ) Industrial AI Technology Through the use of artificial intelligence technologies such as machine vision, speech recognition, data mining, and deep learning, industrial AI application research is carried out, including equipment fault diagnosis and preventive maintenance, product defect detection, product identification and positioning, production safety early warning, and visual guidance. ( 3 ) Wearable Technology By using wearable devices combined with AR/MR and other technologies, industrial site inspection, equipment maintenance guidance, intelligent control of equipment, and other application studies have been carried out. The Institute of IoT is an independent research institution established by Shenzhen Polytechnic University, with scientific research platforms such as "Research Center for Industrial IoT Engineering Technology" granted by the Department of Science and Technology of Guangdong Province, "Laboratory for Industrial IoT Control Technology Engineering" granted by Guangdong Provincial Development and Reform Commission, "Collaborative Innovation Center of Internet of Things Application Technology" granted by the Ministry of Education of the PRC, and "Laboratory of Industrial IoT Heterogeneous Network Control Technology Engineering" granted by the Development and Reform Commission of Shenzhen Municipality. The Institute owns high-end research equipment of tens of millions of RMB. Currently, the Institute of IoT is conducting research in the following areas: ( 1 ) Industrial Internet of Things/Industrial Internet The research in this area includes the interconnection of industrial production equipment, identification and positioning of people and goods, energy-saving control and automatic energy consumption detection, production equipment status detection and fault call, remote notification of important information at production sites, industrial emission reduction, and environmental monitoring, and other common key technologies generated by various demands. ( 3 ) Wearable Technology By using wearable devices combined with AR/MR and other technologies, industrial site inspection, equipment maintenance guidance, intelligent control of equipment, and other application studies have been carried out. Packaging Standardization Technology Collaborative Innovation Center of New Information Software Quality and System Security Testing Center The Institute of Intelligence Science and Engineering of Shenzhen Polytechnic University, also the Joint Laboratory of State Key Laboratory of Industrial Control Technology and Shenzhen Polytechnic University, jointly built by Shenzhen Polytechnic University and State Key Laboratory of Industrial Control Technology, was officially established on April 28, 2018. It is a high-level scientific research institution specializing in core key theoretical research and technology R&D and application in the field of intelligent science and engineering. As an important part of the basic science and applied technology innovation system of Shenzhen Polytechnic University, the Institute of Intelligence Science and Engineering, relying on the talent reserve and research foundation of the State Key Laboratory of Industrial Control Technology of Zhejiang University in the field of control science and engineering, and focusing on "intelligence +", makes full use of the geographical advantages of being located in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. With the help of Shenzhen's superior industrial strategic layout and solid industrial foundation, we are trying to build an innovation platform integrating basic science, applied technology research, engineering development, achievement transfer, and talent training. The Institute consists of the Research Laboratory of Intelligent Motor Body, the Research Laboratory for Intelligent Decision-making in Manufacturing Processes, the Research Laboratory for the Frontiers of Intelligent Science Fundamentals, the Standardization Research Center, the Achievement Transformation and Industrialization Center, and the Multi-functional Office. With the major national demands such as "Artificial Intelligence 2.0" and "Smart Manufacturing 2025" in mind, the Institute has conducted research on frontier scientific problems and engineering application challenges of intelligent systems and has made several breakthroughs in the fields of intelligent system optimization and control and big-data-driven industrial intelligence. The research is mainly focused on the following areas: (1) Dynamic wireless charging sets and technologies for electric vehicles; (2) Energy intelligent management software and hardware system for new energy vehicles; (3) Heterogeneous collaboration and control systems for air/ground robots; (4) Human-machine cooperative manufacturing process planning and scheduling decision and mutual learning systems under uncertain and open environment; (5) Intelligent maintenance and self-healing systems and technologies for control performance in manufacturing processes; (6) Intelligent system automation and integration international and national standards development; (7) V2x-based vehicle-road cooperative intelligent driving system and technology; (8) Application of artificial intelligence and image recognition in medical diagnosis; (9) Control and optimal operation technology for smart factories. The Institute of Intelligence Science and Engineering of Shenzhen Polytechnic University, also the Joint Laboratory of State Key Laboratory of Industrial Control Technology and Shenzhen Polytechnic University, jointly built by Shenzhen Polytechnic University and State Key Laboratory of Industrial Control Technology, was officially established on April 28, 2018.
